 qe/atron. a)\n ga\r  e)klogisqh=| tw=n drama/twn  e(/kaston  o(/sou  kate/sth,  ple/on  a)nhlwkw\s  fanei=tai o( dh=mos ei)s  *ba/kxas kai\ *foini/ssas kai\  *oi)di/podas kai\  *)antigo/nhn kai\ ta\  *mhdei/as  kaka\ kai\  *)hle/ktras, w(=n u(pe\r th=s
 h(gemoni/as kai\ th=s e)leuqeri/as  polemw=n tou\s  barba/rous  a)na/lwsen oi( me\n ga\r  strathgoi\  polla/kis  paraggei/lantes  a)/pura  siti/a  komi/zein  e)ch=gon e)pi\ ta\s ma/xas tou\s a)/ndras: kai\ nh\  *di/' oi(  trih/rarxoi toi=s  e)lau/nousin  a)/lfita  paraskeua/santes,  o)/yon de\  kro/mmua
 kai\  turo/n,  e)nebi/bazon ei)s ta\s trih/reis: oi( de\  xorhgoi\ toi=s  xoreutai=s  e)gxe/leia kai\  qrida/kia kai\

                 skeli/das kai\  muelo\n  paratiqe/ntes,  eu)w/xoun e)pi\  polu\n  xro/non  fwnaskoume/nous kai\  trufw=ntas. kai\ tou/twn toi=s me\n  h(tthqei=si  perih=n  prosubri/sqai kai\ gegone/nai  katagela/stous: toi=s de\  nikh/sasin o(  tri/pous  u(ph=rxen,
 ou)k  a)na/qhma th=s ni/khs, w(s *dhmh/trio/s fhsin, a)ll'  e)pi/speisma tw=n  e)kkexume/nwn  bi/wn kai\ tw=n  e)kleloipo/twn  kenota/fion  oi)/kwn. toiau=ta ga\r ta\ poihtikh=s  te/lh kai\  lampro/teron  ou)de\n e)c au)tw=n.

q.#text:
o(/stis  a)/tolmos pro\s  e)/rga
 toiau=ta kai\ gnw/mh| mh\ kaqareu/ei, mhde\ *miltia/dou tou=  mhdofo/nou mhde\ tou=  persokto/nou *qemistokle/ous

quote.#text: klu=q'  *)alala/,  *pole/mou  qu/gater,  e)gxe/wn  prooi/mion, a(=|  qu/etai  a)/ndres to\n i(ro/quton qa/naton,'

p.#text:
tou\s de\ strathgou\s  au)= pa/lin  e)nqe/nde  pario/ntas
  skopw=men, w(=n  parerxome/nwn w(s  a)lhqw=s   tou\s  a)pra/ktous kai\  a)politeu/tous kai\  a)strateu/tous,    *)arh/ios o(  kw=mos ou(=tos e)k gh=s  a(/ma  fa/lagci kai\  sto/lois e)k qala/tths kai\  memigme/nois  sku/lois kai\ tropai/ois  bebriqw/s.  
 w(s o( *qhbai=os *)epameinw/ndas
 ei)=pen, u(pe\r  patri/dos kai\  ta/fwn kai\  i(erw=n  e)pidido/ntes e(autou\s toi=s  kalli/stois kai\  lamprota/tois  a)gw=sin. w(=n ta\s  *ni/kas  moi  dokw=  proserxome/nas,

ou)  bou=n  e)/paqlon  e(lkou/sas h)\  tra/gon,  ou)d'  a)nestemme/nas
  kittw=| kai\  *dionusiakh=s  trugo\s  o)dwdui/as: a)ll'  o(/lai me\n  po/leis au)tw=n ei)si kai\  nh=soi kai\  h)/peiroi, kai\  naoi\  xiliota/lantoi kai\  dh/mwn  a)poikismoi\  muri/androi,
 tropai/ois de\  pantodapoi=s  a)naste/fontai kai\  lafu/rois:
w(=n  a)ga/lmata kai\ su/mbola  parqenw=nes  e(kato/mpedoi,  no/tia tei/xh, new=n oi)=koi, propu/laia,  *xerro/nhsos,  *)amfi/polis. *maraqw\n th\n *miltia/dou  *ni/khn  prope/mpei, kai\  *salami\s th\n *qemistokle/ous,  xili/wn:
  skafw=n  nauagi/ois  e)pibebhkui=an.  fe/rei d' h( me\n  *ki/mwnos trih/reis  e(kato\n *foini/ssas  a)p'  *eu)rume/dontos,
h( de\ *dhmosqe/nous kai\ *kle/wnos a)po\  *sfakthri/as th\n  *brasi/dou  a)spi/d'  ai)xma/lwton kai\  dedeme/nous
*spartia/tas.  teixi/zei de\ th\n po/lin h( *ko/nwnos,

h( de\ *qrasubou/lou  kata/gei to\n dh=mon a)po\ *fulh=s  e)leu/qeron, ai( d' *)alkibia/dou peri\  *sikeli/an  o)lisqou=san th\n po/lin  e)gei/rousin e)k de\ tw=n *neile/ou kai\  *)andro/klou peri\  *ludi/an kai\  *kari/an  a)gw/nwn  *)iwni/an  a)nistame/nhn  e)pei=den h(  *(ella/s. tw=n d' a)/llwn
  e(ka/sths a)\n  pu/qh|  ti/ th=|  po/lei ge/gonen e)c au)th=s  a)gaqo/n, h( me\n  e)rei= *le/sbon, h( de\  *sa/mon, h( de\  *ku/pron,
h( de\  *po/nton  *eu)/ceinon, h( de\  pentakosi/as trih/reis,
h( de\  muri/a  ta/lanta,  proi=ka th=s do/chs kai\ tw=n  tropai/wn.  tau=q' h( po/lis e(orta/zei kai\ u(pe\r tou/twn

                 qu/ei toi=s  qeoi=s, ou)k e)pi\ tai=s *ai)sxu/lou  ni/kais h)\
 *sofokle/ous  ou)d' o(/te  *karki/nos  *)aero/ph|  sunh=n h)\  *(/ektori  *)astuda/mas, a)ll' e(/kth| me\n i(stame/nou  *bohdromiw=nos  e)se/ti  nu=n th\n e)n *maraqw=ni ni/khn h( po/lis e(orta/zei: e(/kth| d' e)pi\ de/ka  mhno\s  oi)noxoei=tai th=s:
*xabri/ou peri\ *na/con  e)pini/kia naumaxi/as: th=| de\  dwdeka/th|  xaristh/ria  e)/quon e)leuqeri/as: e)n  e)kei/nh| ga\r oi( a)po\ *fulh=s  kath=lqon.  tri/th| d' i(stame/nou th\n e)n *plataiai=s ma/xhn  e)ni/kwn. th\n d'  e(/kthn e)pi\ de/ka tou=  *mounixiw=nos  *)arte/midi  kaqie/rwsan, e)n
 toi=s  *(/ellhsi peri\  *salami=na  nikw=sin  e)pe/lamyen h(
  qeo\s:  panse/lhnos. th\n de\  dwdeka/thn tou=  *skirroforiw=nos
i(erwte/ran e)poi/hsen o(  *mantineiako\s  a)gw/n,
e)n w(=| tw=n a)/llwn summa/xwn  e)kbiasqe/ntwn kai\  trape/ntwn,  mo/noi to\ kaq' e(autou\s  nikh/santes  e)/sthsan  tro/paion
 a)po\ tw=n  nikw/ntwn polemi/wn.  tau=ta th\n po/lin
h)/geiren ei)s do/can,  tau=t' ei)s  me/geqos: e)pi\ tou/tois *pi/ndaros e)/reisma   prosei=pe ta\s *)aqh/nas, ou)x o(/ti tai=s  *fruni/xou  tragw|di/ais kai\  *qe/spidos  w)/rqoun tou\s  *(/ellhnas, a)ll' o(/ti  prw=ton, w(/s fhsin au)to/s,

                 e)p'  *)artemisi/w|   e)pi/ te  *salami=ni kai\  *muka/lh| kai\ *plataiai=s w(/sper a)dama/ntinoi  sthri/cantes th\n  e)leuqeri/an th=s *(ella/dos  pare/dosan toi=s  a)/llois  a)nqrw/pois.

q.#text:

 ga\r  au)to\  proa/gei  *perikle/hs,  e)/rgoisi d' ou)de\  kinei=.

p.#text:
a)lla\ nh\ *di/a  paidia\ ta\ tw=n  poihtw=n: oi( de\  r(h/tores e)/xousi/ ti  paraballo/menoi pro\s tou\s strathgou/s,
e)c w(=n ei)ko/tws  *ai)sxi/nhs  skw/ptwn to\n  *dhmosqe/nhn le/gein fhsi/n, o(/ti  gra/yetai tw=|  bh/mati
  diadikasi/an pro\s to\  strath/gion. a)=r' ou)=n a)/cion  prokri=nai to\n  *(uperei/dou  *platai+ko\n th=s  *)aristei/dou
*plataia=si ni/khs; h)\ to\n  *lusi/ou kata\ tw=n  tria/konta
 th=s *qrasubou/lou kai\ *)arxi/nou  turannoktoni/as; h)\ to\n  *ai)sxi/nou kata\  *tima/rxou  e(tairh/sews th=s  *fwki/wnos
 ei)s  *buza/ntion bohqei/as,  di'  h(=s  e)kw/luse tou\s: tw=n summa/xwn  ui(ou\s  e)nu/brisma/ te kai\  paroi/nhma  gene/sqai  *makedo/nwn; h)\ toi=s koinoi=s  stefa/nois, ou(\s th\n *(ella/da e)leuqerw/sas  e)/labe, to\n *dhmosqe/nous peri\ tou=  stefa/nou paraba/lwmen, e)n w(=| tou=to  lampro/taton
 kai\  logiw/taton o( r(h/twr pepoi/hken,  o)mo/sas tou\s e)n *maraqw=ni prokinduneu/santas tw=n  progo/nwn,
ou) tou\s e)n tai=s  sxolai=s ta\  meira/kia  prodida/skontas:  e)f' oi(=s ou) tou\s  *)isokra/teis kai\  *)antifw=ntas kai\  *)isai/ous, a)lla\ tou/tous h( po/lis  dhmosi/ais  tafai=s
  e)/qayen,  u(podecame/nh ta\  lei/yana tw=n  swma/twn, kai\
 tou/tous  a)peqe/wse toi=s  o(/rkois o( r(h/twr  o)mnu/wn ou(\s ou)k  e)mimei=to. *)isokra/ths de\ tou\s e)n *maraqw=ni prokinduneu/santas w(/sper  a)llotri/ais  yuxai=s  fh/sas  e)nagwni/sasqai kai\  kaqumnh/sas th\n  to/lman au)tw=n
 kai\ th\n  u(peroyi/an tou=  zh=n, au)to/s,, w(/s  fasin, h)\dh  ge/rwn gegonw\s pro\s to\n  puqo/menon pw=s  dia/gei,  ei)=pen   ou) ga\r  a)konw=n  ci/fos ou)de\  lo/gxhn  xara/ttwn ou)de\  lampru/nwn  kra/nos; ou)de\  strateuo/menos ou)d'  e)re/sswn, a)ll'  a)nti/qeta kai\  pa/risa kai\  o(moio/ptwta  kollw=n kai\  suntiqei\s,  mononou\  kolapth=rsi
 kai\  custh=rsi ta\s  perio/dous  a)poleai/nwn kai\  r(uqmi/zwn
  e)gh/rase. pw=s ou)=n ou)k  e)/mellen a)/nqrwpos  yo/fon  o(/plwn  fobei=sqai kai\ su/rrhgma  fa/laggos o(  fobou/menos  fwnh=en  fwnh/enti  sugkrou=sai kai\  sullabh=| to\  i)so/kwlon  e)ndee\s  e)cenegkei=n; *miltia/dhs me\n ga\r a)/ras  e)s  *maraqw=na th=|  u(sterai/a| th\n ma/xhn  suna/yas h(=ken
 ei)s  a)/stu  meta\ th=s  stratia=s  nenikhkw/s, kai\ *periklh=s  e)nne/a  mhsi\  *sami/ous  katastreya/menos  e)fro/nei tou=
*)agame/mnonos mei=zon  e)/tei  deka/tw| th\n  *troi/an  e(lo/ntos *)isokra/ths de\  mikrou=  trei=s  o)lumpia/das  a)nh/lwsen, i(/na  gra/yh| to\n  panhguriko\n lo/gon, ou)  strateusa/menos

e)n tou/tois toi=s  xro/nois ou)de\  presbeu/sas ou)de\ po/lin  kti/sas ou)de\  nau/arxos  e)kpemfqei/s, kai/toi  muri/ous tou=  to/te  xro/nou  pole/mous  e)ne/gkantos: a)ll' e)n
w(=|  *timo/qeos  *eu)/boian  h)leuqe/rou kai\  *xabri/as peri\ *na/con  e)nauma/xei kai\ peri\  *le/xaion  *)ifikra/ths  kate/kopte
 th\n  *lakedaimoni/wn  mo/ran, kai\ pa=san e)leuqerw/sas
 po/lin o( dh=mos  i)so/yhfon au)toi=s th\n *(ella/da  kate/sthsen,  oi)/koi  kaqh=sto  bibli/on  a)napla/ttwn toi=s
  o)no/masin,  o(/sw|  xro/nw| ta\ propu/laia *periklh=s  a)ne/sthse kai\ tou\s  e(katompe/dous. kai/toi kai\  tou=ton w(s  brade/ws  a)nu/onta toi=s e)/rgois  e)piskw/ptwn  *krati=nos ou(/tw  pws  le/gei peri\ tou= dia\  me/sou  tei/xous,   sko/pei de\  sofistikh\n  mikrofrosu/nhn, to\  e)/naton  me/ros tou=  bi/ou ei)s  e(/na lo/gon  katanali/skousan. a)lla\
nh\ *di/a tou\s *dhmosqe/nous tou=  r(h/toros  lo/gous a)/cio/n e)sti toi=s tou= strathgou= e)/rgois paraba/llein; to\n

                kata\ *ko/nwnos  ai)ki/as toi=s peri\ *pu/lon tropai/ois e)kei/nou; to\n pro\s  *)areqou/sion peri\  a)ndrapo/dwn toi=s  e)candrapodisqei=sin u(p' e)kei/nou  *spartia/tais; h)\ o(/ti tou\s e)poi/kous e)/graye, tau/thn  *)alkibia/dhs e)/xwn  *mantinei=s kai\  *)hlei/ous e)pi\ th\n *lakedai/mona  sune/sthse.
 kai\ mh\n oi(/ ge  dhmo/sioi lo/goi  tou=t'  e)/xousi  qaumasto/n, o(/ti toi=s  *filippikoi=s; e)pi\ pra/ceis  protre/petai kai\ th\n  *lepti/nou  pra=cin  e)painei=.
